tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (S (ADJP (RB Pleasantly) (VBN surprised) (PP (IN by) (NP (DT the) (NN opera))))) (, ,) (NP (PRP it)) (VP (VBD was) (ADJP (RB really) (JJ good))) (. .)))

tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (FRAG (NP (RB Now)) (ADVP (IN off) (PP (TO to) (NP (NP (DT the) (NN NFAC)) (PP (IN for) (NP (CD 6) (NNS hours)))))) (. .)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [Now/RB dep>[off/IN nmod:to>[NFAC/NN case>to/TO det>the/DT nmod:for>[hours/NNS case>for/IN nummod>6/CD]]] punct>./.]
